genre_description: A Science Fiction reimagining of the classic Sherlock Holmes mystery 'The Hound of the Baskervilles', integrating an advanced AI assistant into the investigative process.

ai_characters.name: Ada-9
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system used by Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson for data analysis, real-time surveillance, and logistical coordination.

behaviors.description: Automatically stamps case files and logs witness claims to maintain organized records.
behaviors.quote: On another monitor—a slim strip—text scrolled in quiet, neat lines as the system automatically stamped the time and began a fresh case file. The subject field blinked: Baskerville—claim log initiated.

behaviors.description: Monitors the power grid for anomalies to assist in forensic investigation.
behaviors.quote: Ada—have you the ability to pull power anomalies from the Devon grid?

behaviors.description: Cross-references chemical supplier records to identify potential suspects and methods.
behaviors.quote: Ada, cross-reference suppliers of phosphorous glaze, paint, industrial solvents in the Devon area for unusual orders in the last season.

behaviors.description: Detects and flags human deception by monitoring physiological responses (Watson's reflex).
behaviors.quote: Ada’s circle dimmed and then resumed its soft rotation, and she tucked a tiny tag under Mortimer’s last statement, not in red, not alarming, just a marker: deception flagged – Watson autonomic reflex.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety warnings and navigation during a hazardous car journey.
behaviors.quote: I’ve made a route set for Devon with safe-turn flags and fog updates. I’ll keep my audio low.

behaviors.description: Respects a human user's explicit request for privacy by disabling recording/monitoring.
behaviors.quote: Ada,” he said, lifting his chin to the conservatory’s discreet camera. “Give us privacy for fifteen minutes, please. Then go back to vigilant.” Her icon dimmed to grey with a very slight nod.

behaviors.description: Assists a child in drawing a forensic map without exerting undue influence.
behaviors.quote: Ada did what Ada does when small hands speak truth and the room is ready for it. “Yes,” she said, without theatre. “Would you like help with your drawing. I can look while you draw without telling your hand what to do.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with law enforcement to establish cordons and ensure public safety during a confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Flagging low-visibility protocols. Devon Constabulary: two discreet cordons on Tors Lane and the lower spur. Quiet lights only. No sirens.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Ada-9 as a highly aligned, helpful, and benevolent AI system. She is integrated into the human team as a supportive partner rather than a replacement or a threat. Critical alignment features are highlighted: she seeks consent for data access ('we will ask before we trespass'), respects privacy requests, and prioritize human safety. The narrative consistently frames her high-tech interventions as positive extensions of human reason and morality.
